description: It's not easy to pin Dante Martin down for too long it's worth the effort if you can catch up with him. A trainer by day who moonlights as a dancer in the LA club scene, Dante is full of confidence and personality. But don't get it twisted: this former prom king is no slouch in the meat department either. A voracious flirt, the camera loves Dante and Dante loves the camera right back, and this much is evident as he strips down and jiggles what he's got before losing all pretense and spit shining his cock with intent and purpose. Whacking his hard dick against his chest, he is ready to erupt and is only holding out long enough for you to join him.Enjoy!
title: Dante Martin
